subTasks.subTaskName: Create your own Project by clicking the new project button
Enter a Project Name and press Submit
Click on your new project on the Project list
Create a new task by clicking the new task button
Enter the New Task details such as name, due-date, etc.
To delete a task press the X button on the top left corner of a task (Try it with this task)
Create a new sub-task by clicking the new sub-task button
Enter the New Task name and press submit
Click on any of your sub-tasks to remove them from a task (Try it with this sub-task)
To delete one your projects press the Delete Project button near the top next to the project name
Enjoy the website! (This Project is safe to delete now)
